author: wtopstaff
title: Clippers-Hornets, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 11, 2015 3:49 am L.A. CLIPPERS (94) 
Johnson 3-5 0-0 7, Griffin 6-14 1-3 13, Jordan 2-4 0-0 4, Prigioni 2-5 0-0 5, Redick 9-16 1-1 23, Pierce 0-2 3-4 3, Crawford 5-12 2-3 12, Smith 4-9 4-4 14, Stephenson 3-8 0-0 7, Aldrich 0-1 0-0 0, Wilcox 0-4 0-0 0, Mbah a Moute 3-5 0-0 6, Hayes 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 37-85 11-15 94. CHARLOTTE (106) 
Batum 3-6 5-6 11, M.Williams 2-6 0-2 4, Jefferson 4-11 0-0 8, Walker 5-8 3-4 13, Lamb 4-8 2-2 12, Zeller 6-6 3-4 16, Lin 6-12 3-4 16, Roberts 5-7 2-2 12, Hawes 4-14 1-2 10, Harrison 1-3 0-0 2, Kaminsky 0-2 2-2 2, Thompson 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 40-83 21-28 106. L.A. Clippers 28 27 22 17— 94 Charlotte 37 20 28 21—106 
3-Point Goals_L.A. Clippers 9-27 (Redick 4-9, Smith 2-4, Johnson 1-1, Prigioni 1-3, Stephenson 1-3, Griffin 0-1, Pierce 0-2, Wilcox 0-2, Crawford 0-2), Charlotte 5-22 (Lamb 2-4, Zeller 1-1, Lin 1-3, Hawes 1-5, M.Williams 0-1, Walker 0-2, Harrison 0-2, Roberts 0-2, Batum 0-2). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_L.A. Clippers 47 (Griffin 9), Charlotte 55 (Hawes 13). Assists_L.A. Clippers 27 (Griffin 10), Charlotte 22 (Walker 5). Total Fouls_L.A. Clippers 23, Charlotte 19.
